wikipedia_page.main: Michael T. Wright, FSA (Born: 16 June, 1948) was formerly curator of mechanical engineering at the Science Museum and later at Imperial College in London, England. He is known by his analysis of the original fragments of the Antikythera mechanism and by the reconstruction of this Ancient Greek brass mechanism.
